document.full_text: a sunday night custom of eating peanuts while watching soccer has led to a discovery: what you eat before you give blood may result in a severe allergic reaction in people who receive that blood.
document.title: peanut-eating blood donors spark allergic reaction
lines_and_colors: a sunday night custom of eating peanuts while watching soccer has led to a discovery: what you eat before you give blood may result in a severe allergic reaction in people who receive that blood.
